synopsis:
After finding a strangely-colored crystal in the ruined mines he's always excavating at, Sogo returns to town in high spirits, only to get caught up in a quarrel between his friends, Kaon and Roman. This leads him to make a very surprising discovery.
 
 
▼ Ep. #01 Director: Yasuhito Kikuchi
▼ Series Director: Atsushi Nakayama
▽ Daichi to shounen [Japan: original Romaji title]
▽ The Boy and the Vast Land [Japan: literal English translation / Int'l: renamed English title]

Sogo and friends manage to escape their predicament in the cave and make it back home in one piece. While they're deciding what to do with the mysterious girl, Sogo finds a strange little animal.
 
 
▼ Ep. #02 Director: Yasuhito Kikuchi
▼ Series Director: Atsushi Nakayama
▽ Hitotsu yane no shita de [Japan: original Romaji title]
▽ Under One Roof [Japan: literal English translation / Int'l: renamed English title]

Sogo and friends head to downtown Garden Indigo, only to get caught in a trap laid by a madman obsessed with Felia.
 
 
▼ Ep. #03 Director: Yasuhito Kikuchi
▼ Series Director: Atsushi Nakayama
▽ Gaaden • indigo [Japan: original Romaji title]
▽ Garden Indigo [Japan: literal English translation / Int'l: renamed English title]

Disaster looms over Garden Indigo for the first time in forty years, as a typhoon is headed its way.
 
 
▼ Ep. #04 Director: Yasuhito Kikuchi
▼ Series Director: Atsushi Nakayama
▽ Arashi [Japan: original Romaji title]
▽ Storm [Japan: literal English translation / Int'l: renamed English title]
